"Grad": "Alright! I appreciate you stopping to hear me out!"
"I'm in the middle of upgrading some weapons, but I don't have enough Ore."
"I'm an engineer by trade, not a fighter. It's much too dangerous out there for me to get it myself."
"So, that's why I need someone like you. Could you go and get some Ore for me?"
"I'm not in any particular hurry. Just get what you can, when you can. Alright then, nice to have met you!"
